Juventus haven't abandoned the 'track' leading to Angel Di Maria. Jorge Mendes is 'increasingly allied with Fabio Paratici and Juventus', a little detail that puts in favor what has long been the object of Juventus' desire in the past. [Corriere di Torino]

replies.msg: Marcelo insists ‘I haven’t heard about any offers’ from Juventus and that ‘no-one’s more Real Madrid than me’.

People were wondering why Dybala had so much space in the first half, but it was because United concentrated on stopping Ronaldo.

His presence alone meant that, when the ball came near the box, defenders were marking him or watching him. That left Dybala spare on several occasions, not just when he got the winning goal.
